Name: Nathalia
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Herbal bananas and cognac. Be warned; the subtle sweetness conceals its strength.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2006 at English Bar, Regina Hotel, Paris, France.
Nutrition: One serving of Nathalia contains 287 calories
